original_text: All the workers who had special skills made the tabernacle with ten curtains. They used very good linen, as well as blue, purple and red material. They made beautiful pictures of cherubs on the curtains.
korean_text: 일하는 사람 중에 마음이 지혜로운 모든 사람이 열 폭 휘장으로 성막을 지었으니 곧 가늘게 꼰 베 실과 청색 자색 홍색 실로 그룹들을 무늬 놓아 짜서 지은 것이라

sentences.original_text: All the workers who had special skills
made the tabernacle with ten curtains
as well as blue, purple and red material
sentences.korean_translation: 파란색, 보라색, 빨간색 재료도 함께 사용했다

sentences.original_text: They made beautiful pictures of cherubs
